reviews.review: Одна из лучших игр в своём жанре!

It's just CS... what can go wrong ?

*Full Russian team screaming around*
*Ennemy team is smurf Global Elite*
*Team buys deagle 1st round and get killed instantly*

Yes... it's CS :D
